BBGEF-BB GLOBAL ENVIRONMENTAL FUND,TF038172-TUNISIA: INDUSTRIAL ENERGY
            EFFICIENCY PROGRAM,TF054398-GEF-TUNISIA: ENERGY EFFICIENCY
            PROGRAM/INDUSTRIAL SECTOR PROJECT

abstracts.cdata!:
The main objective of the Energy
            Efficiency Program Industrial Sector Project is to overcome
            barriers to the development of a sustainable market for
            energy efficiency products. The closing date for the project
            was extended three times: a first extension from December
            31, 2009 to December 31, 2010 was granted in July 2009, a
            second extension to September 30, 2011 was granted in
            December 2010, and a third and final extension to November
            30, 2011 was granted in September 2011. A first reallocation
            of funds also took place in July 2010, totaling USD 625,000.
            USD 225,000 were reallocated to the guarantee component and
            USD 400,000 to the technical assistance, leading to the
            current budgets of USD 3.725 million and USD 2 million, respectively.
